title: On Hot Days….
detail_text: <:th_ch0103/>Phew~, it’s quite hot huh....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>On hot days, you’d want this, right? Kanan-chan<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Iced coffee! What’s this for?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>I brought it from home. Cold brew.... was it? That’s the trend now, right? I read it online<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Could it be…. that you made this, Riko-chan….?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Ehehe, you like iced coffee, right, Kanan-chan? But I don’t think I can say that I made it. I just put some coffee beans in some water before I went to bed, so….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>No, no, no, you spent your time making this, so it counts. I’m really happy! Thank you~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>I tried it this morning, I think it turned out to be a pretty good brew. Do try it♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Hnnn-! There's bitterness to it, but the aftertaste is refreshing.... Delicious! I love it just like this<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>I’m glad. Fufu, I’ll make it again sometimes<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
